package.name: HTML_Table
package.summary: PEAR::HTML_Table makes the design of HTML tables easy, flexible, reusable and efficient.
package.description:
The PEAR::HTML_Table package provides methods for easy and efficient design of HTML tables. - Lots of customization options. - Tables can be modified at any time. - The logic is the same as standard HTML editors. - Handles col and rowspans. - PHP code is shorter, easier to read and to maintain. - Tables options can be reused.
For auto filling of data and such then check out http://pear.php.net/package/HTML_Table_Matrix

release.notes: - Bugfix: addCol() must not call Storage::updateRowAttributes(), but Storage::addCol() - Bugfix: addCol() had the same problem as in request #4988 (it did not accept array keys as row numbers) - Bugfix: toHtml() wrongly assumed that there are instances of $_thead and $_tfoot when $useTGroups == true - Bugfix: return PEAR_Error object in getCellContents when cell does not exist - Couple of unit tests were added, covering a lot of ground.
